About me

I have a passion for creating meaningful and magical experiences with software and hardware. Focused on empowering content creation and creativity, and computing that feels human.

I'll be joining Valve full-time starting Summer 2018 to work on virtual reality.

My projects have used C, C++, C#, Python, Javascript, C#, Java, and PHP.

Places I can be found:

  • GitHub
  • Facebook
  • LinkedIn

You can also read my resume.

I study computer science at the Rochester Institute of Technology. I'm a member of the Computer Science House.
